mapper.select: select id, settlement_id, withdraw_no, interface_name, info_json, result_json, process_flag, process_time, process_comment, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter from golden_processlog
mapper.insert: INSERT into golden_processlog ( settlement_id, withdraw_no, interface_name, info_json, result_json, process_flag, process_comment, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter )values ( #{settlementId}, #{withdrawNo}, #{interfaceName}, #{infoJson}, #{resultJson}, #{processFlag}, #{processComment}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{quarter} )
